name: Rita C. Deleo
content: I love my !! It is definitely more slim and lightweight than my iPhone 8 plus.

title: Low quality front facing camera
name: Raymond S. Courtney
content: I upgraded from a Samsung Galaxy S10. I used the iPhone for about a day and ended up just going back to my Samsung Galaxy.

title: Iphone is overrated
name: Linda S. Mullen
content: I’m embarrassed to own this $800 lump of junk. I hate it so much I’m am writing this review with it before I switch to the Samsung Galaxy S21 ultra 5G

title: It feels like they’re making these worse on purpose
name: George maxwell
content: This is the last iPhone I’ll own, I hate it so much, this is the one that’s going to make me never buy another iPhone and I’ve had them since the 4.

name: Martha S. Odom
content: Love the phone. Been wanting it since it came out and finally put some money together to buy it. I do must say I’m happy to be back with iPhone.

title: Do not buy, until you read the bad reviews.
name: bendon Meckalam
content: Worst iPhone I’ve ever had. A ton of things downgraded. The phone will just decide you have been listening to music too loud for too long and cut the volume in half.
